name: sbr-monorepo
description: Next.js monorepo with web and admin applications

scripts.dev:prepare: cd packages/database && npx prisma@5.19.0 generate && npx prisma@5.19.0 db push
scripts.clean:all: rimraf node_modules && rimraf packages/database/node_modules && rimraf packages/auth/node_modules && rimraf packages/shared/node_modules && rimraf packages/config/node_modules && rimraf packages/email/node_modules && rimraf packages/ui/node_modules && rimraf apps/admin/node_modules && rimraf apps/web/node_modules && rimraf apps/admin/.next && rimraf apps/web/.next && rimraf packages/database/.prisma
scripts.db:push: cd packages/database && npx prisma@5.19.0 db push
scripts.db:migrate: cd packages/database && npx prisma@5.19.0 migrate dev
